metadata.title: CVE-2014-9377 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the nbns_spoof function inplug-ins/nbns_spoof/nbns_spoof.c in Ettercap 0.8.1 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via a largenetbios packet.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
